content.text: How to onboard a new Retailer
Step 1-Open a new SR Request on the SNOW portal.
Step 2-Guidelines need to be followed when raising a new SR Request on the SNOW portal.
Step 3-Open a New SR Form on the path mentioned as-:
https://loreal.service-now.com
=> Raise a new request => Fill SR Form .
Step 4-Title should be "
Sell-out-EU 360 Crunch! On-boarding of a new retailer.
Step 5-Subtitle should be "
B2B Sell-out data cleaning for Europe and integration into GCP EMEA data foundation.
Step 6: Form Validation.
Step 7 – Submit the Request.
How to Change existing Service Request
Step 1-Guidelines need to be followed while updating the existing SR Request on the SNOW portal.
Step 2-Open an existing SR update form on the path mentioned as
https://loreal.service-now.com
=> List of Active SRs =>Click on SR for Update => File an SR Update Form.
Step 3-Title should be "
Sell-out EU 360" Crunch! "Modify or delete an already existing flow from a retailer.
Step 4-Validate the Form.
Step 5 – Submit the Request.
TEST
